column4: so I know my Chicago-style pizza. But I prefer Giordano's
column5: and here's why: Lou Malnati's has a tendency to choke me. The cheese chokes me. The slab of sausage (which is like a layer of sausage smooshed into the bread) chokes me. I like the tomato slices on top
column6: but that's not worth giving an extra star. The crust is ok
column7: but I prefer Giordano's again because Lou's is too dry. In this city
column8: choosing your pizza place is like choosing your baseball team
column9: and I've had drag-out fights over this Lou's business. But I'm sticking with my Giordano's (or the original Uno).
